page.title: 07The Bad Harvest
page.content: The weather this summer has been so wet that all the farmers in this area, including my grandad have had difficulty getting their hay in. My grandad thinks that this summer has been the worst he has ever had for harvesting. The hay was rotting on the ground, and the grain was overipe and not the best quality, even if it could be gathered in, as lot of it was flat on the ground, due to heavy rain and storng winds. It will cost my grandad more money this winter to feed his stock, s he will have to buy more hay, to feed them when they are inside in the cold winter.
